text: Zhou Hui (; born 1989) is a Chinese female badminton player. Born in Lin'an City, Zhou joined the Zhejiang Province badminton team in 2000, and she was chosen to join the national junior team in 2005. In 2009, she competed at the 2009 East Asian Games in Hong Kong, and won gold for the women's team event. She won her first international individual title at the Syed Modi India Grand Prix tournament. == Achievements == === BWF Grand Prix === The BWF Grand Prix has two level such as Grand Prix and Grand Prix Gold. It is a series of badminton tournaments, sanctioned by Badminton World Federation (BWF) since 2007.
